title: How do i add friends

replies.body: You used to be able to add friends in old.avicus.net. This is basically the old website before this one. However, you cannot access it anymore. Just wait for a future update to bring the feature back.
replies.body_tagged: You used to be able to add friends in old.avicus.net. This is basically the old website before this one. However, you cannot access it anymore. Just wait for a future update to bring the feature back.

replies.body: As everyone said, we will get the "add friends" back after the winter update and the new Avicus Website for the winter update.
